title: Why Digital Growth Often Stalls
point1: Agencies are Over-Engineered: Large overheads often mean you pay for bloated processes and features that don't drive immediate ROI.
point2: The 'Builder' Trap: DIY platforms like Wix seem easy initially but hit a performance wall. They hurt your SEO and make custom logic nearly impossible.
point3: Technical Debt Accumulates: Without a pro managing security and dependencies, websites degrade over time, leading to downtime or security risks.
point4: Lack of Agility: Businesses change fast. Being locked into a rigid dashboard—or waiting weeks for an agency to fix a typo—kills momentum.
description: I bridge the gap between expensive agencies and limited site builders. Professional code, flexible ownership, and zero technical headaches.
